tests.question: Which scholars won Physics in 1921?
tests.cypher: MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:WON]->(p:Prize) WHERE p.category = 'physics' AND p.awardYear = 1921 RETURN s.knownName

tests.question: Which scholars were born in Germany?
tests.cypher: MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:BORN_IN]->(c:City)-[:IS_CITY_IN]->(co:Country) WHERE toLower(co.name) CONTAINS 'germany' RETURN s.knownName

tests.question: Which prizes were awarded in 1922?
tests.cypher: MATCH (p:Prize) WHERE p.awardYear = 1922 RETURN p.category

tests.question: Which scholars won Chemistry prizes in 2000?
tests.cypher: MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:WON]->(p:Prize) WHERE p.category = 'Chemistry' AND p.awardYear = 2000 RETURN s.knownName

tests.question: Which prizes were awarded in 1922?
tests.cypher: MATCH (p:Prize) WHERE p.awardYear = 1922 RETURN p.category

tests.question: Which scholars were born in Paris?
tests.cypher: MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:BORN_IN]->(c:City) WHERE toLower(c.name) CONTAINS 'paris' RETURN s.knownName

tests.question: Which institutions are located in USA?
tests.cypher: MATCH (i:Institution)-[:IS_LOCATED_IN]->(c:City)-[:IS_CITY_IN]->(co:Country) WHERE toLower(co.name) CONTAINS 'united states' OR toLower(co.name) CONTAINS 'usa' RETURN i.name
expected: University of Texas Southwestern Medical Center at Dallas
Columbia University Division, Cardio-Pulmonary Laboratory, Bellevue Hospital
Johns Hopkins University School of Medicine
University of Chicago, Ben May Laboratory for Cancer Research
University of California, Kavli Institute for Theoretical Physics
National Institute of Standards and Technology
Janelia Research Campus, Howard Hughes Medical Institute

University of California School of Medicine
Center for Study of Public Choice
University of Texas MD Anderson Cancer Center
Research Division of Infectious Diseases, Children's Medical Center
IBM Thomas J. Watson Research Center
Binghamton University, State University of New York
National Institute of Environmental Health Sciences
Laboratories of the Division of Medicine and Public Health, Rockefeller Foundation
Massachusetts Institute of Technology (MIT), Center for Cancer Research
New York University, College of Medicine

tests.question: Which scholars won Nobel Prizes in Physics after 1990?
tests.cypher: MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:WON]->(p:Prize) WHERE p.category = 'Physics' AND p.awardYear > 1990 RETURN s.knownName

tests.question: Which scholars affiliated with an institution in Germany died between the years 1935 and 1945?
tests.cypher:
MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:AFFILIATED_WITH]->(i:Institution)-[:IS_LOCATED_IN]->(c:City)-[:IS_CITY_IN]->(co:Country)
WHERE (toLower(co.name) CONTAINS 'germany' OR co.name = 'DE')
  AND s.deathDate >= '1935-01-01'
  AND s.deathDate <= '1945-12-31'
RETURN DISTINCT s.knownName AS Scholarname, i.name AS InstitutionName

tests.question: Which scholars won the Nobel Prize in Physics in 1933?
tests.cypher: MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:WON]->(p:Prize) WHERE p.category = 'Physics' AND p.awardYear = 1933 RETURN s.knownName

tests.question: Who are the female laureates in Physics?
tests.cypher: MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:WON]->(p:Prize) WHERE p.category = 'Physics' AND s.gender = 'female' RETURN s.knownName

tests.question: Which scholars born in France won a Nobel Prize in Chemistry?
tests.cypher: MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:WON]->(p:Prize) WHERE toLower(p.category) = 'chemistry' MATCH (s)-[:BORN_IN]->(c:City)-[:IS_CITY_IN]->(co:Country) WHERE toLower(co.name) = 'france' RETURN DISTINCT s.knownName

tests.question: Which Physics laureates were affiliated with an institution in Denmark?
tests.cypher: MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:WON]->(p:Prize) WHERE p.category = 'Physics' MATCH (s)-[:AFFILIATED_WITH]->(i:Institution)-[:IS_LOCATED_IN]->(c:City)-[:IS_CITY_IN]->(co:Country) WHERE toLower(co.name) = 'denmark' RETURN DISTINCT s.knownName

tests.question: Which scholars affiliated with Stanford University won a prize in 1996?
tests.cypher: MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:WON]->(p:Prize) WHERE p.awardYear = 1996 MATCH (s)-[:AFFILIATED_WITH]->(i:Institution) WHERE toLower(i.name) CONTAINS 'stanford' RETURN DISTINCT s.knownName

tests.question: Which scholars won the Nobel Prize in Economics in 2019?
tests.cypher: MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:WON]->(p:Prize) WHERE p.category = 'economics' AND p.awardYear = 2019 RETURN s.knownName

tests.question: Which scholars affiliated with Harvard University won the Medicine prize?
tests.cypher: MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:WON]->(p:Prize) WHERE toLower(p.category) CONTAINS 'medicine' MATCH (s)-[:AFFILIATED_WITH]->(i:Institution) WHERE toLower(i.name) CONTAINS 'harvard' RETURN DISTINCT s.knownName

tests.question: Who won the Nobel Prize in Physics in 2020?
tests.cypher: MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:WON]->(p:Prize) WHERE p.category = 'physics' AND p.awardYear = 2020 RETURN s.knownName

tests.question: Which scholars born in New York City won a Physics prize?
tests.cypher: MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:BORN_IN]->(c:City) WHERE toLower(c.name) IN ['new york, ny', 'new york'] MATCH (s)-[:WON]->(p:Prize) WHERE p.category = 'physics' RETURN s.knownName

tests.question: Which female scholars won the Nobel Prize in Medicine?
tests.cypher: MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:WON]->(p:Prize) WHERE p.category = 'medicine' AND s.gender = 'female' RETURN s.knownName

tests.question: Which scholars affiliated with an institution in France won the Economics prize?
tests.cypher: MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:WON]->(p:Prize) WHERE p.category = 'economics' MATCH (s)-[:AFFILIATED_WITH]->(i:Institution)-[:IS_LOCATED_IN]->(:City)-[:IS_CITY_IN]->(co:Country) WHERE toLower(co.name) = 'france' RETURN DISTINCT s.knownName

tests.question: Which scholars won a prize with a 1/3 share portion?
tests.cypher: MATCH (s:Scholar)-[r:WON]->(p:Prize) WHERE r.portion = '1/3' RETURN s.knownName

tests.question: Which institutions in Japan have been affiliated with Physics laureates?
tests.cypher: MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:WON]->(p:Prize) WHERE p.category = 'physics' MATCH (s)-[:AFFILIATED_WITH]->(i:Institution)-[:IS_LOCATED_IN]->(:City)-[:IS_CITY_IN]->(co:Country) WHERE toLower(co.name) = 'japan' RETURN DISTINCT i.name
expected: Yukawa Institute for Theoretical Physics (YITP), Kyoto University

tests.question: Who won the Nobel Prize in Chemistry in 2022?
tests.cypher: MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:WON]->(p:Prize) WHERE p.category = 'chemistry' AND p.awardYear = 2022 RETURN s.knownName

tests.question: Which scholars affiliated with Columbia University won the Economics prize?
tests.cypher: MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:WON]->(p:Prize) WHERE p.category = 'economics' MATCH (s)-[:AFFILIATED_WITH]->(i:Institution) WHERE toLower(i.name) CONTAINS 'columbia university' RETURN s.knownName

tests.question: Which scholars affiliated with Yale University won a prize in Chemistry?
tests.cypher: MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:WON]->(p:Prize) WHERE p.category = 'chemistry' MATCH (s)-[:AFFILIATED_WITH]->(i:Institution) WHERE toLower(i.name) CONTAINS 'yale university' RETURN s.knownName

tests.question: Who are the scholars affiliated with the University of Chicago who won the Economics prize?
tests.cypher: MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:WON]->(p:Prize) WHERE p.category = 'economics' MATCH (s)-[:AFFILIATED_WITH]->(i:Institution) WHERE toLower(i.name) CONTAINS 'university of chicago' RETURN s.knownName

tests.question: Which scholars won Physiology or Medicine in 1920?
tests.cypher: MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:WON]->(p:Prize) WHERE toLower(p.category) = 'physiology or medicine' AND p.awardYear = 1920 RETURN s.knownName

tests.question: Which scholars won Chemistry in 2010?
tests.cypher: MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:WON]->(p:Prize) WHERE toLower(p.category) = 'chemistry' AND p.awardYear = 2010 RETURN s.knownName

tests.question: Which scholars won Chemistry in 1926?
tests.cypher: MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:WON]->(p:Prize) WHERE toLower(p.category) = 'chemistry' AND p.awardYear = 1926 RETURN s.knownName

tests.question: Which scholars won Chemistry in 1990?
tests.cypher: MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:WON]->(p:Prize) WHERE toLower(p.category) = 'chemistry' AND p.awardYear = 1990 RETURN s.knownName

tests.question: Which scholars born in Taiwan won the Chemistry prize between 1986 and 1991?
tests.cypher: MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:WON]->(p:Prize) WHERE toLower(p.category) = 'chemistry' AND p.awardYear >= 1986 AND p.awardYear <= 1991 MATCH (s)-[:BORN_IN]->(c:City)-[:IS_CITY_IN]->(co:Country) WHERE toLower(co.name) CONTAINS 'taiwan' RETURN DISTINCT s.knownName, p.awardYear, co.name AS BirthCountry

tests.question: Which scholars affiliated with Institute for Infectious Diseases won a prize in Physiology or Medicine?
tests.cypher: MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:AFFILIATED_WITH]->(i:Institution), (s)-[:WON]->(p:Prize) WHERE i.name = "Institute for Infectious Diseases" AND toLower(p.category) = 'physiology or medicine' RETURN s.knownName

tests.question: Which scholars affiliated with CERN won a prize in Physics?
tests.cypher: MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:AFFILIATED_WITH]->(i:Institution), (s)-[:WON]->(p:Prize) WHERE i.name = "CERN" AND toLower(p.category) = 'physics' RETURN s.knownName

tests.question: Which scholars affiliated with University of Oxford won a prize in Chemistry?
tests.cypher: MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:AFFILIATED_WITH]->(i:Institution), (s)-[:WON]->(p:Prize) WHERE i.name = "University of Oxford" AND toLower(p.category) = 'chemistry' RETURN s.knownName

tests.question: Which scholars were born in Pretoria?
tests.cypher: MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:BORN_IN]->(c:City) WHERE c.name = "Pretoria" RETURN s.knownName

tests.question: Which scholars were born in Turin?
tests.cypher: MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:BORN_IN]->(c:City) WHERE c.name = "Turin" RETURN s.knownName

tests.question: Which scholars born in Switzerland won the Physics prize between 1980 and 2020?
tests.cypher: MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:WON]->(p:Prize) WHERE toLower(p.category) = 'physics' AND p.awardYear >= 1980 AND p.awardYear <= 2020 MATCH (s)-[:BORN_IN]->(c:City)-[:IS_CITY_IN]->(co:Country) WHERE toLower(co.name) CONTAINS 'switzerland' RETURN DISTINCT s.knownName, p.awardYear, co.name AS BirthCountry

tests.question: How many female scholars won a Nobel Prize between 1980 and 2000?
tests.cypher: MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:WON]->(p:Prize) WHERE s.gender = 'female' AND p.awardYear >= 1980 AND p.awardYear <= 2000 RETURN count(s) AS FemaleLaureates

tests.question: Which scholars have won more than one Nobel Prize?
tests.cypher: MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:WON]->(p:Prize) WITH s, count(p) AS prize_count WHERE prize_count > 1 RETURN s.knownName

tests.question: How many Physics laureates were born in Paris?
tests.cypher: MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:BORN_IN]->(c:City) WHERE toLower(c.name) CONTAINS 'paris' MATCH (s)-[:WON]->(p:Prize) WHERE toLower(p.category) = 'physics' RETURN count(DISTINCT s)

tests.question: How many scholars won a prize with a 1/3 share portion?
tests.cypher: MATCH (s:Scholar)-[r:WON]->(p:Prize) WHERE r.portion = '1/3' RETURN count(s)
